text: Karl Spillman Forester (May 2, 1940 â€“ March 29, 2014) was an American judge. He was the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Kentucky. He served from July 27, 1988 until his death in March 29, 2014. He was nominated by President of the United States Ronald Reagan. Forester died in Lexington, Kentucky, aged 73. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American judges Category:People from Kentucky
title: Karl Spillman Forester
